Text:
Whn Kim dotcom'd got arrested ,I thought I'd never find such scarce cinematic gems again.We are deeply indebted to you for making all these films available on TPB.I can't thank you enough for all of your work.If you upload on request,I have few of them,

1.Charisma (1999) 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0201517/

2.The Booth (2005) by Yoshihiro Nakamura
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0760506/

3.Rainbow Kids 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0101648/

4. River of First Love (2004) 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0396445/

5.Please please please extend the period of seeding to couple of days.

Thanks in anticipation.Long Live Korosawa.Long Live Ozu.Long Live JCinema.Banzaix3!

Those films are all in line :)
Can't seed more than one day though. I'd never be able to finish them all!
Oh ! I didn't read that you are uploading movies in alphabetical order.Thanks for reply.
